evidence.text:
Person B: Allegedly.
Person A: It's almost like he wants me to stab him.

Person B: Snake venom.
Person B: So if this is gonna make us remember... what do we think is making us forget?

Person A: Whoo! Go off, queen!
Person A: Oooo... we got ourselves a sticky situation.
Person B: Awwwww. I had a puppy once. He died.

Person A: You didn't get any. Go again, girl.
Person B: Frida! You want some of this?
Person B: `Desiderium.' It means nostalgia. It's latin, bitches.
